para.sentence: U\left(a,z\right)=U\left(a,0\right)u_{1}(a,z)+U'\left(a,0\right)u_{2}(a,z), V\left(a,z\right)=V\left(a,0\right)u_{1}(a,z)+V'\left(a,0\right)u_{2}(a,z), where the initial values are given by (12.2.6)â€“(12.2.9), and u_{1}(a,z) and u_{2}(a,z) are the even and odd solutions of (12.2.2) given by u_{1}(a,z)=e^{-\tfrac{1}{4}z^{2}}\left(1+(a+\tfrac{1}{2})\frac{z^{2}}{2!}+(a+ \tfrac{1}{2})(a+\tfrac{5}{2})\frac{z^{4}}{4!}+\cdots\right) , u_{2}(a,z)=e^{-\tfrac{1}{4}z^{2}}\left(z+(a+\tfrac{3}{2})\frac{z^{3}}{3!}+(a+ \tfrac{3}{2})(a+\tfrac{7}{2})\frac{z^{5}}{5!}+\cdots\right).
